catalog_info.title: The 18th Century: Ethical Dilemmas
catalog_info.notes: Conducted in French. This course, when taken for a letter grade, meets the General Education requirement for Ethical Reasoning.
catalog_info.description: Questions how notions of personhood and otherness inhabit the emergent novel, exploring the way in which events and values are resisted or subsumed in literary discourse and the kind of social and political responsibility that accompanies it.
